father and son.title: Ken Norton
father and son.desc: Of all the titles I’ve been privileged to have, 'Dad' has always been the best.

father and son.title: Frank Pittman
father and son.desc: Fathering is not something perfect men do, but something that perfects the man.

Good morning quotes.title: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.

Life quotes.title: Dolly Parton
Life quotes.desc: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.

Life quotes.title: Dalai Lama
Life quotes.desc: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

Life quotes.title: John Lennon
Life quotes.desc: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

Life quotes.title: Stephen King
Life quotes.desc: Get busy living or get busy dying.

Life quotes.title: Albert Einstein
Life quotes.desc: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.

Life quotes.title: Babe Ruth
Life quotes.desc: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

Life quotes.title: Will Smith
Life quotes.desc: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

Life quotes.title: Steve Jobs
Life quotes.desc: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
